version_description: • Stability improvements for all supported iOS versions

• Improved controls in levels offering 3 pieces
• Performance improvements for iOS 9
• General improvements
• Minor bug fixes

• A new set of 11 Christmas levels
• Now you will get 3 daily hint points in case of running the app
• iPad Pro minor improvements

• A new set of 10 Chinese levels
• No more In-App Purchases!
• Daily Hint-Points are now increased to 5
• Added synchronization between Apple TV and iOS devices
• bug fixes and improvements for all supported iOS versions

• iPhoneX ready!
• minor bug fixes and various improvements

A new “Other Worlds” chapter with over 30 levels in 3 unique thematic environments: Ancient Worlds, Music and Space.
The chapter is available now as a separate purchase.

The new chapter - “Other Worlds”, available as a separate purchase. Get over 30 levels in 3 unique thematic environments: Ancient Worlds, Music and Space.

• Bug fixes.

The new chapter - “Other Worlds”, available as a separate purchase. Get over 30 levels in 3 unique thematic environments: Ancient Worlds, Music and Space.
• General improvements in "Other Worlds" chapter
• Bug fixes

• The new “Other Worlds” chapter available as a separate purchase. Get over 30 levels in 3 unique thematic environments: Ancient Worlds, Music and Space!
• Еxclusive Shadowmatic iMessage sticker pack.
• General improvements.

• Tweaks and fixes in the recently added "Other Worlds" chapter
• App preview update for iPhone X
• General improvements

• Assistant Button.
The Assistant Button helps you to solve the puzzle by gradually rotating the objects in the right direction by approximately 30 degrees, allowing you to guess the silhouette or tap the button again for another 30-degree rotation. You can continue tapping until the puzzle is solved. When you tap the Assistant Button, Hint-Points are used.

• Hint-Points Store
• General improvements
